text:
e="preserve">Carlos Eduardo Cintra da Costa Pereira (April 23, 1940 – December 13, 2020), better known as Carlos Eduardo Cadoca or simply Cadoca, was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was born in Recife, Pernambuco.
Cadoca was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement, Social Christian Party and the Communist Party.
Cadoca was a member of the Recife city council from 1983 to 1995. He later was a member of the Pernambuco Legislative Assembly from 1995 to 1999. From 1999 to 2019, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies.
On December 13, 2020, Cadoca died in Recife from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 80.
